title: Problem Redeeming Dreadknight Garen
body:
Hello !

I have followed the official LoL twitter to get Garen and the Dreadknight Skin, and I have recieved the code, however I am unable to redeem it. Anyone knows why? I double checked and I did get the EU code since I play on EUW, and the code was issued today so it's not an old one?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Sorry for the trouble here.  I've added the might juggernaut to your account.  ^^

I also have the same problem can you help me please?

Thank you very much.
i have the same problem and i can give you the screenshots if you want- can you help me too plz?
